ChangeLog   ChangeLog 
0.15.0 [2016-07-31]
In memory of our team member Barry Gerdes.
Version 0.15.0 brings an another big leap forward in astronomical accuracy
for
historical applications and improvements. The major changes:
- Added experimental support of getting planetary positions from JPL DE430
and
DE431 ephemerides
- Added StelProperty system
- Added new plugin for exhibitions and planetariums - Remote Control
- Added new skycultures: Macedonian, Ojibwe, Dakota/Lakota/Nakota,
Kamilaroi/Euahlayi
- Updated code of plugins
- Added Bookmarks tool and updated AstroCalc tool
- Added new functions for Scripting Engine and new scripts
- Added Miller Cylindrical Projection
- Added updates and improvements in DSO and star catalogues (include initia
l
support of The Washington Double Star Catalog)
- Many fixes and improvements...
Full list of changes: https://launchpad.net/stellarium/0.15/0.15.0
0.14.3 [2016-03-20] 0.14.3 [2016-03-20]
Bugfix release: Bugfix release:
- Added Bengali description for landscapes (LP: #1548627) - Added Bengali description for landscapes (LP: #1548627)
- Added background transparency in Oculars plugin (LP: #1511393) - Added background transparency in Oculars plugin (LP: #1511393)
- Fixed serial port issue on Windows version (LP: #1543813) - Fixed serial port issue on Windows version (LP: #1543813)
- Fixed MESA mode on Windows (LP: #1509735) - Fixed MESA mode on Windows (LP: #1509735)
- Fixed Stellarium crashes in ocular view of Saturn/Neptune/Uranus (LP: #14 95232) - Fixed Stellarium crashes in ocular view of Saturn/Neptune/Uranus (LP: #14 95232)
- Fixed artifacts in rendering of Mercury in the Sun (LP: #1533647) - Fixed artifacts in rendering of Mercury in the Sun (LP: #1533647)
- Fixed loading scenes for Scenery 3D plugin (LP: #1533069) - Fixed loading scenes for Scenery 3D plugin (LP: #1533069)
- Fixed movement of radiant when time is switched manually (LP: #1535950) - Fixed movement of radiant when time is switched manually (LP: #1535950)
 End of changes. 1 change blocks.
